about_the_game:
Wake Sakia from her slumber to make her powerful abilities your own! Sporting a cool and calm demeanor, Sakia plays with your foes by redistributing status effects as need be, while continuously buffing your party.

*DLC characters can be recruited upon completion of the first quest.
detailed_description:
Wake Sakia from her slumber to make her powerful abilities your own! Sporting a cool and calm demeanor, Sakia plays with your foes by redistributing status effects as need be, while continuously buffing your party.

*DLC characters can be recruited upon completion of the first quest.
name: Eternal Dreamers - Sakia, the Manipulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual-Core Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything w/ OpenGL support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
